com.mdc.bot.command

Interface Command

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoolCommand, DivinePunishmentCommand, DuelCommand, FSpeakCommand, GameReqCommand, HelloCommand, HelpCommand, ListCommand, ShutdownCommand, TimeoutCommand, TTSCommand, UpdankCommand, VersionCommand

    public interface Command
    Command interface for all commands under a single name.
    Author:
    xDestx

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String COMMAND_PREFIX

      Used to run a command.

        static final java.lang.String COMMAND_PREFIX
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • called

        boolean called(CommandSet s,
               MDCBot b)
        Used to verify whether a command is valid
        Parameters:
        s - CommandSet for this command
        b - The bot
        Returns:
        true, if valid command

      • action

        void action(CommandSet s,
            MDCBot b)
        Used to run a command. Should be called after called(CommandSet, MDCBot) returns true.
        Parameters:
        s - CommandSet for this command
        b - The bot

      • getHelpMessage

        java.lang.String getHelpMessage()
        Get the help message for this command.
        Returns:
        HELP

      • getChildCommands

        Command[] getChildCommands()
        Get all child commands of this command. Ex /duel *accept* @user, accept is the child.
        Returns:
        Sub-commands of this command

      • isRootCommand

        boolean isRootCommand()
        Tells whether this is the top level of a command tree
        Returns:
        true, if there are is no parent command

      • getParentCommand

        Command getParentCommand()
        Get the parent command, if it exists.
        Returns:
        The parent command, itself otherwise

      • parseCommand

        static CommandSet parseCommand(java.lang.String message,
                               net.dv8tion.jda.core.events.message.MessageReceivedEvent e)
        Parse text for command, return the command given or null if no command
        Parameters:
        message - Discord message content
        e - The message event
        Returns:
        Command or null
